duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop robust multi-channel campaigns, big ideas, and innovative marketing programs to inspire customers and bring the Libbey brand to life.
Create attention-grabbing ideas and campaigns designed to stand apart from competitors.
Transform concepts and ideas into engaging content for print material, packaging, web content, video content, interactive media, and social media.
Maintain a visual design consistent with brand image and standards implemented across all campaign touchpoints.
Collaborate in concept development and design ideation with creative director, business managers, and the marketing team.
Manage, layout, and edit pieces of photos and product information from major catalogs and develop smaller, impactful, customer-specific catalogs and brochure.
Lead, influence, and empower the organization to fulfill the purpose of the brand.
Cultivate a diverse and inclusive culture where associates can thrive and fuel ideas/innovations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Art, Graphic Design, or Visual Communications required.
